participant_1.name: Brad
participant_1.personality: Confident and slightly jaded, he often expresses dissatisfaction with his surroundings, but has a soft spot for good food.
participant_1.background: I am bored of my maids. I married miss usa. I have more money than i know what to do with. My favorite dessert is cheesecake. My children are a dissapointment.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and caring, she thrives on helping others and enjoys an active lifestyle filled with fun and social activities.
participant_2.background: I work at a non profit that helps children. My favorite food is cheese. I m allergic to shellfish. I like horseback riding. I love going to concerts and dancing hard.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I work at a non profit that helps children.
That's great! I'm sure you're making a difference in the world.
I hope so! I love my job.
What's your favorite food?
Cheese! I love all kinds of cheese.
Me too! I love cheese and crackers.
What's your favorite type of cheese?
I love brie cheese. It's so creamy and delicious.
Brie is my favorite too! Have you ever had goat cheese?
No, I haven't. What's it like?
It's a little different than brie, but it's still really delicious. It has a tangy flavor.
I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! I think you'll like it.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love horseback riding. I used to do it all the time when I was a kid.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I've never tried it before.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I'll have to look into it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also love going to concerts and dancing hard. I'm always up for a good time.
That sounds fun! I'm not much of a dancer, but I love going to concerts.
We should go to a concert together sometime!
That would be fun
